pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Banana Python SDKPlease see our usage docs in the official [Banana Documentation](https://docs.banana.dev/banana-docs/core-concepts/sdks/python)## Developing on the SDKSet up the environment and install the package in editable mode```bashpython -m venv .venvsource .venv/bin/activatepip install -e ./```Set up a test directory to play around with the changes```bashmkdir testscd teststouch test.py```Create some script```pythonfrom banana_dev import APIapi = API("11111111-1111-1111-1111-111111111111")projects, status = api.list_projects()print('list', projects, status)project, status = api.get_project(projects["results"][0]["id"])print('get', project, status)updated_project, status = api.update_project(projects["results"][0]["id"], {"maxReplicas": 2})print('update', updated_project, status)```Run it```bashpython test.py```
